tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr.kiran chouka is a wonderfull, encouraging, supporting and offcourse a brilliant  surgen and a excellent Doctor.I would like to share my experience(Hi I am Dr.Divakara,Bvsc,Mvsc(med) a veterinary Doctor by profession, I am 76 years old and my weight is about 100kgs. I was suffering from left  knee pain from past one and half years and later my both knees started to pain and from past few months it was sevear pain. So I decided to consult a doctor and searched the net for some doctors, I saw Dr.Kiran chouka reviews were very good so I thought of consulting him. I visited him in Columbia Asia refferel hospital, yeshwanthpur. He examined me and told me that about 60 to 70 percent of my knees are damaged so he told knee replacement surgery is the only option and the best solution for my problem. The surgery was planed after a week and I went through the surgery on 29th October 2021 by Dr.Kiran chouka and It went brilliantly well and you don't belive it I was able to walk within 24 hrs of the surgery with no pain, so I am going for my left knee replacement also which is scheduled on 2nd November 2021.I went through my second surgery ie..the left knee replacement  as scheduled on 2nd November and it also went on very well in fact it got over earlier than the previous one  it did all my knee exercises after afew hours of surgery and I walked the next morning with the support of walker. I have to say I can already feel the difference in my right knee.  It's really a good feeling all thanks to Dr.kiran chouka who's been a wonderfull , encouraging,  supporting and offcourse a wonderfull surgen and a excellent doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My mother had been suffering from knee pain in her right leg from the last 2 years and she has been postponing her Char-Dham Religious Trip for the same reason. She was very skeptical about the TKR surgery to be done and this is when I took her to Dr Kiran Chouka at **** **** ***** ******* ** ******* ****** The doctor took sufficient amount of time to understand the issue that my mother was facing. He asked her to take some x-rays to check for the latest condition, post which he suggested knee replacement(TKR).
Dr Kiran did not ask to get the surgery done immediately. Instead he gave enough confidence to my mother about the surgery and explained the entire procedure. He also showed some of his patients videos (which included the doctors own mother's post TKR surgery). He assured her that she will be able to complete her Char-dham Religious Trip this year itself and this is when my mother felt confident that she is in safe hands. 
Finally my mother decided to go ahead with the surgery at Apollo Hospital Sheshadripuram where Dr Kiran Chouka is Head of Orthopedic Department. He made sure that everything went smoothly from the time my mother got admitted till the time of discharge. Additionally Dr. Kiran Chouka made some special arrangements to ensure that my mother felt comfortable and the surgery was 100% successful. 
Post surgery my mother was able to walk a few steps on the very next day itself and physiotherapist used to visit twice a day in the Hospital (It is normally once in other hospitals).
Dr Kiran Chouka wanted my mother to walk out of the Hospital on her own right from the beginning and miraculously, with very little support my mother was able to walk out of the hospital on her own.
Going an extra mile, he himself also arranged for a very good skilled physiotherapist to come home everyday for 3 weeks (minimum) and I am already looking forward to the day when my mother will walk without any pain.
Dr Kiran is a genius and extremely passionate towards his work. At such a young age he has excelled in the field of Orthopedics and yet is very down to earth. Dr Kiran does not have the urge to surpass others at whatever cost, but the urge to serve others at any cost.
I am extremely thankful to Dr Kiran Chouka for everything he has done *** ** ** *** **** ********** ******* * **** *** **** *****  I will definitely vouch for him on any given day.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
The problem that I had was unique and occurs during heavy lifting in sports. The Bicep tendon was ruptured not in the shoulder (proximal which has a 99% occurrence rate) but at the elbow (distal 1% occurrence). So I know it will be difficult to find a surgeon who has done such a surgery. However, when I met Dr Kiran Chouka, just listening to my symptoms, he was able to diagnosis what the problem was and where the tendon has ruptured. 

He explained me the complete procedure of the surgery, how complex it is, and what things he needs to take care of because of my body built and the type of bones that we Indians have in the elbow. He also said surgery is not necessary if I am are not going to perform certain activities in my day-to-day life.

What I observed are:

1. He is a very confident person.
2. He is an artist and wants to perform surgery as an artist. That means he wants the surgery to be perfect with minimal incision. 
3. Similar traditional surgeries will involve higher incision areas, whereas, for me, the incision was very minimal. Such a type of surgery will take a longer time and require a huge amount of patience.
4. The post-surgery dressing was perfect, with pain vanishing within a day.
5. After 3 visits (in 1.5 months) the doctor asked me no further visits are necessary unless I have any problem.

I am posting this experience after 2.5 years of surgery because I wanted observe the post-surgery complications. However, there are no complications. I am able to perform each and every activity that I used to perform before. And there are no visible marks on my incision point.

Thank you doctor for the treatment.

tags: Wait time,
review:
It has been horrible experience and it has happened multiple times now. When you take appointment you will get call from Manipal who will change the timings when you reach hospital you will have to wait for atleast 2-3 hours despite schedule appointment and staff and doctor will provide false status. 

After sometime doctor will send his assistant and nobody will tell you that he is not Kiran chowk an and he will behave as if he is . *** ******* ** **** ********* ** ***** ****** *** ***** ******** ***** ** *** *** ***** **** *** **** *** **** ******** 

Multiple patients had a fight in Manipal hospital and written complaints were filled with their administration about this ill practice. 

Please do no

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I first of all would like to thank Dr.Kiran Chouka for an excellent surgery.I had a knee bone fracture and had medial meniscus repair which was highly complicated.I wasn’t able to stand,had severe pain in my knee making it difficult to walk.
My friend suggested me to consult Dr.Kiran Chouka.On showing my x ray and MRI scan he told that I have had a very serious injury but not in a frightening way,he smilingly said it’s serious but nothing to worry.He personally booked an appointment for surgery and it was excellently done.
   The surgery was for 3 and a Half hours.I could see how complicated that injury was as I was conscious and was able to see my own surgery.
    It’s been 5 months now where Iam able to walk,jog and run like normal person.All credit goes to Dr.Kiran Chouka and thank you for getting me back to normal life.I strongly believe that if it wasn’t him I would have ended up limping around whole of my life.Kudos to You doctor.
    If you are treated by Dr.Kiran Chouka trust me your in hands of the finest orthopaedic doctors.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: One of the good calm surgeon that I came across in North Bangalore. After two ACL reconstruction both on my right knee in 2007 & left knee in 2014, I managed to twist my left knee & tore my ACL with complex Meniscus tear again in July 2021, I consulted Dr.Kiran Chouka & with his confidence diagnosis we planned to go ahead with the ACL reconstruction & Meniscus repair, he was very clear to make me understand on the procedure & the entire treatment. We finally went ahead with the surgery on 20th Oct 2021 in Columbia Asia Hebbal & the doctor showed me live surgery procedure to build that confidence mentally to know what he was doing & how it was done so it gave me a boost to know what procedure my knee underwent. I would like to thank the entire team who performed the surgery right from the Anesthesia Specialist Dr.Chandrashekar who played good songs during procedure to Dr.Kiran Chouka's team of doctors - Santosh, Tarun, Devraj & the whole nursing staff who was part of the procedure. With confidence & what next & how to strengthen my both legs with the next physiotherapy sessions, I am signing off to follow the next adventure journey.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had twisted my left knee while changing direction during a game of badminton. As soon as I has the injury, I was aware that something had gone wrong terribly.
Dr. Kiran is like the light you see at the end of the tunnel literally. I was feeling totally miserable after my injury but as soon as I visited Dr. Kiran and his team, it was like a burden had been removed from my shoulders. 
Dr. Kiran warmly welcomed me and heard my complaint and did a physical examination to confirm. There is a saying that goes like "If you cant teach it to a six year old, then you dont understand the thing". Now I am no 6 year old, but the way Dr. Kiran explained the anatomy of the knee and the exact problem that I was facing, I was pretty sure that he knows all about this and my case was in the best hands.
The complete process and formalities of the surgery were done without any hassle and I was even shown the live surgery where the Dr. communicated with me and highlighted the issues and steps being taken to resolve them. It was one of a kind experience for me the way this entire surgery was carried out. 
Dr. Kiran and his entire team will make you feel at home all the time and is highly recommended for orthopaedic surgeries.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Would like to start by thanking Dr Kiran for treating my 12 year old son soo well. My son had a fall while cycling and on taking to a nearby hospital was advised he needs to go thru a surgery and plate/screws implants are required. I was lucky to find Dr.Kiran Chouka on time and reached out to him. He was patiently waiting for us in Apollo Hospital around 6.30pm, saw my son's injury and explained us the details of injury/bone breakage and how he would operate on the injury. The next day operation was performed and for our luck Dr Kiran managed to complete the process without any implants and just with a pin which was removed over the next 2 weeks. The best part of the surgery was NO external part in my son's hand which will cause any kind of discomfort as he grows up. Lastly, really appreciate the patience and passion Dr. Kiran has towards treating his patients and special mention about the way he treats kids.. He personally did the dressing of both the PoP and the Green bandage after removal of the pins

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Hi, myself Sumith Rajamani met with an accident and had a right wrist Dislocation which is also called Radius Distal Fracture. Due to few suggestions given I had taken a chance of visiting an ayurvedic center for the same in which a Puttur Cut was done for my hand and this was continued for the next three months since the incident. However, there was no signs of recovery and my wrist started growing in a wrong position and my bones were crushed inside into pieces and this was known to me after a MRI scanning was done and due to this I had lost hope that I would fight back again as I'm an International Muay Thai Indian player who won  a Silver Medal in World Muay Thai Championship held in Bangkok ,5 Times National gold medalists in India and won various competitions so far. Then one of our family doctor (Dr.Dhamodar) suggested Dr.Kiran Chouka the best orthopedic surgeon in india for my treatment. At first I went with 0% hope but the way I was treated and given a ray of hope was simply amazing which made me get a hope of recovery. I was suggested a surgery had to be done which lasted for 3-4 hours and Dr. Kiran Chouka had taken a huge risk in doing this surgery for me as it was a complicated case. But with his hardwork and our family prayers my hand is recovering at its best and I'm very thankful to Dr. Kiran Chouka for bringing my hand almost to an old form in just one month of surgery dated (19/01/2021).

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: ** ** ***** * *** ***** ****** **** ** ** ***** * *** **** *** **** * On 28th June at 10 pm , my husband met with an accident at home and fell off from bed . The next day we went to an Ortho,  as he was not able to move his hand . After x- ray few ortho doc said that surgery was very important but before surgery he went for covid 19 test as govt. has made it mandatory . Unfortunately my hubby came to be covid +  asymptomatic and doctors were regretting to do his surgery and few asked me double the surgery cost and due to our financial crisis we had to wait for 14 days and did home isolation . I was very nervous as his  hand condition was  getting severe day by day and he was suffering with pain . And finally Dilipji gave us Dr.Kiran Chouka contact number and he immediately responded and called us  and said  even if it comes positive test he will do the surgery as we cannot delay it any more. After two days surgery was done and my husband right arm was saved  . Dr.Kiran is so down to earth, full of positivity and very helpful. ** ** ** ***** **** ** *** ** ** *** ** ******** We are Greatful to you sirji. You are a saviour and a protector.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I had a fall while dancing at my friend sangeet with broken ACL and meniscus Ligaments. I was having terrible pain and difficult while walking . After several opinions my friend Dr Prem Kiran suggested me to visit to Manipal hospital and meet Dr Kkiran Chouka and the day I met the Doctor I was in a positive feeling that I was under better hands and I was perfectly treated to my satisfaction.

He pays attention to the individual in detail with extreme care and a human touch making him as an ideal doctor.

Our sincere thanks to Dr Kkiran and his professional team of Doctors, I would highly recommend him for ACL and meniscus reconstruction and other relevant Surgeries.

My sincere thanks and best wishes to Dr Kkiran Chouka and their team...for all their affords and care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: When I went to visit the doctor, he was busy with a surgery and I met his junior, which I am ok with. The junior doctor asked me to take some blood reports and send it to Dr. Kiran for further analysis. I did that and even after repeated WhatsApp msgs, he just refuses to reply to any of them after sending him my reports. I can see a blue tick which means he read it and ignored it. After paying the consultation fees and seeing some junior doctor, least he could do was to atleast reply to msgs. Feel completely che ated . Never going back to him for sure.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My hand was badly fractured by an accident I met  Dr Kiran chouka in Manipal hospital yeshwanthpur and he suggested , Arthroscopy surgery for my hand and operated  it was really excellent result I stay in Tumkur and I got to know about him and came to operate from Dr Kiran chouka doctor was the best and he does work very dedicated and again after 1 year i had fallen in office and my leg was fractured and came back to Dr Kiran chouka he did surgery with very minimal pain , now I am walking and my hand is also good without pain I thank God with my whole heart to Dr Kiran chouka for his wonderful dedication and passion work with his magic hands  any orthopedic problem I always recommend Dr Kiran chouka hopefully.Thank you doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: *** ***** ****** *** ********** ****** ** ***** What a wonderful doctor. My mother had her right knee replaced by this doctor at Manipal hospitals yeshwanthpur. He takes the patience under his confidence. My mom visited many doctors before we met Dr. Kiran, she was convinced that he is going to do her surgery . His team , physiotherapists hospital staff were all very helpful . She walked n climbed steps 2 days after surgery n now discharged . She's healing and as the doctor has promised she should be up n walking by herself in 3 weeks time after physio. Highly recommend this doctor. Thank you.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Writting this review after undergoing Ligament tear surgery (ACL & Meniscus) from Dr. Kkiran Chouka.  
 Doctor is unique in his approach: extremely confident, practical and creates positive mindset with patients.
 I am happy that my surgery was successfull with great Precision and  doctor explained & showed the entire operation theatre procedures Live. Doctor has in-house physiotherapist Mr. Kumar, he is well trained & experienced PT and extremely polite. 
*** ****** ****** ** *** ** *** ****** *********** ********** ** **********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My Father aged 70 got replaced both his knees by Dr Kiran Chouka in Manipal Hospital yeshwanthpur Bangaluru on 22 July 2022. Dr. Kiran and his teams completed both the knees at a single stretch with 100% successful, thank you very much Dr. Kiran Chouka sir. Operation went very well and was made to walk within 2 days and discharge from hospital was done in 5 days. Overall operation went very well. I would definitely recommend Dr Kiran Chouka for knee replacement surgery. After the surgery within a week my father was walking independently and also started using steps slowly. For my father initially there was bit knees pain and gradually knees pain are reduced. Dr Kiran sir teams, physio and Manipal hospital staffs are very much supportive. Its good to do physio for 3weeks after surgery and beyond that shall continue as per patients comfort. Thanks a lot to Dr. Kiran Chouka sir, his team, physio and Manipal hospital staffs for the successful surgery now my father is doing very well.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Hi Sir, Hope you doing well... This is Geetha from Bangalore.  You have done B/L Total Knee replacement to my father on 07 - June - 2014, Exactly 8 years before. Really you have done a miracle sir... he don't had  any pain, swelling or even a  simple complaints in the past 8 years.. that to even  single day!! at the time of discharge you have adviced some medicines for 10days... expect that medicines for that 10days and one follow up visit he has not used any medication and even single tablet or pain management gel/spray/creams etc.. he is absolutely fine... it's not Knee Replacement!! Its Re-creation... you have Re-created his legs....We are blessed to be in this era of medicine where even a 60 year old person can be made to normal with this system..We have to take strength from real person like you... you will be always in our prayers... May god gives you all strength and good health for ever and always to serve the people like us and to the society...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Kiran comes across as a very friendly Doctor, and quick to diagnose the issue correctly. I have been suffering from knee pain for about 3 years, and have seen various doctors. I was referred to Dr.Kiran by a relative of mine. on the 1st visit, Dr Kiran asked for a  X-ray to be done, and on examining the X-ray, suggested that I needed to have both the knee replaced. It has been two months since the surgery, wherein I was put through Physio theraphy sessions under the care of  keroj kumar for a month, who comes across as a very caring, efficient professional. I am feeling very good now ,and have almost got back my mobility like it was prior to the knee pain. Wish all the very best to Dr.Kiran and his team

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: My mother has knee pain from past 5-6years tried with many doctors for without operation but no use and we came to know from one of our relatives Dr. Kiran Chouka was made many this type of surgeries and successfully patients doing fine. we consulted Doctor he advised for surgery as my mother not able to walk and had bilateral knee replacement surgery post operation recovered very quickly doctor boasted confidence on patient every day and she was walking now we are very satisfied whenever we calling doctor responding very well and giving prompt response.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Visited for my mothers Sciatica issue, Dr. Kkiran explained us very well with how the treatment would be, as the issue in hand turned out to be a bit more complicated Dr suggested us to get it fixed surgically, initially we weren’t ready for this but Dr Kkriran made sure we were well aware of what the process would be, This gave us more confidence, Kudos to Dr with this as he lays it all out with layman terms so you are clear with what's gonna happen.

Now the surgery is complete my mother is recovering well, the time Dr. visited us post the surgery he spent a lot of time with the patient, filling us with a lot of positivity and i feel he goes the extra mile to ensure the patient is confident of his/her recovery path. 

To sum it up, he well aware of what he does, what to do. And someone who is full of positive vibes.

I'd also like to appreciate the physiotherapists at his clinic as well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** ** *** **** ********** *******. My father was suffering from severe knee pain since 12 years post knee replacement surgery he can walk pain free and able to use the stairs without support. His recovery was also quick.

The doctor is very friendly and explains the issue in detail, he boosts the confidence of the patient by his charm. I am very much satisfied about the service and care worth the money and time. Doctor responds very well for each and every questions  asked. I highly recommend this doctor for any orthopedic treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am Shyam Kashyap from Bangalore. In a very scary ankle fracture, I was in deep pain. We approached Dr. Kiran Chouka and all our hopes came back. He immediately arranged for a surgery. It was a very very complex surgery. He put all his effort and a lot of time for a successful surgery. I had a successful surgery 2 weeks back and will be able to walk in 2 months. All thanks to the doctor. Without his help and support we wouldnt even think of this day. Myself and my wife would recommend people to go to Dr. Kiran. He is really magical. Thanks doctor for everything..
In all, I am very thankful to Dr Kiran Chouka and his team. Kavya the co ordinator, was constantly in touch about my health. 
Hatsoff Dr. Kiran Chouka....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My Heartful Thanks to you Dr. Kiran. 😎We were very lucky to meet you. With your timely suggestion my father is very happily walking around now. Since my father  K.L. Narayana Guptha  is 82 years old, we were not ready to get him done knee replacement. We thought it is not possible at this age. But you were amazing Dr. You created a new hope in us and we got him done the surgery in Apollo Hispital. Now he is able to walk independently. He can bend and fold his leg as the natural one. No surgery mark is seen. Really you did a miracle Dr. Kiran  We are very proud to know you .😊🤝

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My mother who is 56 years had knee joint pain for more than a decade and it was becoming difficult for her to walk or do regular chores. We visited Dr. Kiran Chowka with this problem. Dr. Kiran was very clear with the diagnosis and said that my mother has to undergo total knee replacement surgery for both her legs. He was very friendly and filled the confidence in my mother that she can undergo the surgery with minimal pain. She was admitted in Hospital for 7 days and both the knees were replaced. The operation was 100 percent successful. My mother was able to walk without the help of walker in just 3 days after surgery. Would highly recommend Dr.Kiran Chowka for your Ortho problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My wife, aged 72 years recently had an accident and underwent left hip hemiarthroplasty with modular hip-prosthesis at Apollo hospital, Sheshadripuram, Bengaluru. **** *** **** ** *** **** ********** ******* *** ***** ******* She was able to walk the day after her surgery with minimal help and with .walker support. She has recovered well and is back to her normal routine. 
Our grateful thanks and indebtedness to Dr. Kiran Chouka for his perfection and deft hands. I strongly feel that it is his personal commitment to his profession and patients that has made him the best Ortho-Care surgeon of this mega city. We wish him all the success and continued growth in his profession and dedication to his patients. May his tribe increase.

DO NOT Think twice to consult him for any problem related to ortho.
Thank you Very much Dr Kiran Chouka Sir.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I am sonia srivastava and I came to dr. Kiran on jan 8th 2020 after a fall at home.Looking at my state n xrays he told us at the age of 27 it's impossible to fracture ur femur neck right hip.We were in doldrums  my mom even requested him to allow us to go back to r hometown.He didn't stop us but just told us to take it seriously and be practical.It was seriously not a joke.Its purely his noble personality and the confidence in his words"Sonia maam after ur under my treatment u will walk out as if u never had dis fall, trust me" and dis was it v blindly entrusted r trust n cooperation to dr.He also told us he's packed with emergency operations and he will operate the day after but within no time sent us call o get ready for surgery the very evening he has postponed all surgeries for me n taken it us as priority.This was really sweet of him .
Today I can vouch that t i'm doin good under his care.Both my family n me feel his wrds during the recovery process he continues to assure the best post removal as well .Thank u so much dr. for your noble care rendered you us in emergency.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My mother was suffering from Knee pain since 5-6yrs. One of my cousin referred us to Dr Kiran Chouka, with no doubt i can say he is very experienced doctor in Bengaluru for replacing the knee. At our first visit itself he was friendly and explained the root cause of the knee pain. Within 1week he helped us to schedule the Knee surgery at Colombia Asia hospital. Surgery took almost 4hrs and it was successful. Post surgery knee pain has gradually reduced and mom is able to walk without the walker, thats the happy moment for us.. On the whole any person who is suffering from Knee pain or any Ortho related issues, please visit Dr Kiran to happily walk pain free for 20yrs..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Visited Dr. Kiran for shoulder injury, initially I went to another doctor who suggested I require surgery to treat it, so I visited Dr. Kiran for a second opinion and he assured me that all I need is some physiotherapy sessions along with Thera band exercises, and he promised me my pain will subside and shoulder feels like before.Kheroj Kumar the physiotherapist was also of great help, he taught all the exercises and today I can do planks and all thanks to both of them.I appreciate the way the doctor assures us that we will recover completely and he doesn't scare us over our injuries, he is very friendly. "don't give control to your mind, trust your body and be calm, everything will heal" his kind words has encouraged me a lot during the excruciating painful days. Keep up the good work doc.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: my experience with the doctor was good, he is patient, listens to the issues put out, and then suggests a treatment, he did the same for me too and hes very friendly My chronic back pain due to sports injury was bothering me, and he told hed be able to fix it within a month, with some medications and some physiotherapy.but after following the regime strictly and regular physio, for more than month I didnt get relief and it was of little to no benefit for me.I'm disappointed, with myself and him a little, got to look for other options asap :(I don't mean to be negative about the doctor, I've seen so many good reviews on him, ***** ** **** ***** **** ** *** ** *******
